document_data.mainbody:
Pretti was a cat that lived in Arabel with its person during the mid–14 century DR.
When the gods of the Realms took mortal form on Faerûn during the Time of Troubles in the , the eccentric old man that lived with Pretti fervently told everyone the cat was the embodiment of Oghma, the Lord of All Knowledge. While no one in town believed the old fool, Prettis opinion on the matter was unknown.
